title: World Bank says Zimbabwe's near-term economic outlook positive
description:
HARARE, Dec. 2 (Xinhua) -- Zimbabwe's near-term economic outlook is positive with growth anticipated to remain at 5 percent in 2026, the World Bank said Tuesday.

According to the Zimbabwe Economic Update released by the World Bank in Harare, Zimbabwe's capital, the country's growth would be driven ...

title: No going back on US dollar phase-out: RBZ
description:
RBZ deputy governor Innocent Matshe allayed fears over the de-dollarisation roadmap.

title: Zimbabwe to link exchange rate to hard assets, create currency board
description:
Zimbabwe to link exchange rate to hard assets, create currency board

The Zimbabwean dollar has fallen about 40% since the start of the year, hurt by increased foreign-currency demand from civil servants being paid December bonuses and weaker commodity prices denting inflows.

title: Government told to adopt "effective" economic policies towards Vision 2030
description:
ZES vice-president Misheck Ugaro.

Zimbabwe Economics Society (ZES) vice-president Misheck Ugaro says that investment in infrastructure, ease of doing business, and a negotiated de-dollarisation roadmap are crucial to achieving the 2030 goal of an upper middle-income economy.

title: Zimbabwe Sees Economic Growth Rate More Than Doubling in 2025
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Zimbabwe’s economic growth rate will more than double next year as the country recovers from a devastating drought and benefits from rising manufacturing activity, according to government estimates.

Gross domestic product will probably expand 6.5% in 2025, from an estimate of 2% this...

title: Zimbabwe removes 12 zeros from currency
description:
HARARE, Zimbabwe (CNN) -- Zimbabwe slashed 12 zeros from its currency as hyperinflation continued to erode its value, the country's central bank announced Monday.

Patrick Chinamasa, Zimbabwe's acting finance minister, arrives last week at Parliament to present the '09 budget.
